import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./AddTodo.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTodo=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/todos',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}`},body:JSON.stringify({title,userId:'userId123'})// Use actual userId
});if(response.ok){navigate('/todos');}else{alert('Failed to add To-Do');}}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"addtodo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Title:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true,className:"form-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",children:"Add"})]})]});};export default AddTodo;
